altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.

description.de: Bereichert durch die Erfahrungen, die sie im ersten Teil ihrer Story gemacht hat, wandert Emanon nun durch das Japan der späten 1960er Jahre. Im Laufe ihrer Wanderungen trifft sie auf diverse Menschen, bei denen sie einen mehr als nur bleibenden Eindruck hinterlässt. Gleichzeitig bringen die kumulierten Erinnerungen von mehr als drei Milliarden Jahren jedoch nicht nur Vorteile mit sich, was sie mehr als nur deutlich bemerkt, wenn sie sich einer Person erklärt, die genau genommen gar nicht existieren dürfte …
description.en:
In the sequel to "Memories of Emanon," our eponymous heroine continues her journey through time, carrying with her 3 billion years of memories. 
When Emanon reunites with her long lost twin brother, confessions are made and secrets are revealed that will make her question her way of life and the very nature of her existence.   
  
The first half of volume 1 is the colored chapters "Wandering Emanon" (published before as Emanon Episode: 1).   
The second half is "Wandering Emanon '67" which is set before "Wandering Emanon."

title.en: Tenseishita Daiseijo wa, Seijo Dearu Koto wo Hitakakusu: A Tale of The Great Saint

altTitles.ja: 転生した大聖女は、聖女であることをひた隠す A Tale of The Great Saint

altTitles.en: A Tale of the Secret Saint

altTitles.fr: La grande Sainte réincarnée cache que c'en est une.

description.en:
Fia, who is aiming to be a knight in a family of knights, remembers her previous life as a "Grand Saint" when she was on the verge of dying. The saint is currently a highly important and respected profession because it's on the verge of extinction! The holy power she can use happens to be the "lost magic" of myths.  
  
In her previous life, she was threatened by the right arm of the Demon King, saying, "I'll kill you again if you're reborn as a saint."  
  
"If I use such power, I wonder if I would be caught and killed once again…"  
  
Watch as she tries to live a simple life as a knight, hiding the fact that she's a Grand Saint!  


---

- **[Official English License Announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/09/18/seven-seas-reveals-a-great-secret-with-license-of-a-tale-of-the-secret-saint-light-novel-and-manga-series/)**  
- **[Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/a-tale-of-the-secret-saint-light-novel/)**
description.ja: 「剣の才能がない」と言われていた騎士家の少女・フィーア。彼女は死にかかった際、規格外のチート能力を持つ「大聖女」だった前世を思い出し、最強の魔物・黒竜を従魔にする。しかし前世で「聖女として生まれ変わったら殺す」と魔王の右腕に脅されたことを思い出した彼女は、大聖女の力を隠しながら、騎士を目指すが数々の騒動を巻き起こすことに！？

altTitles.es: La bebe maestra de las flores

altTitles.en: The Little Lady Who Makes Flowers Bloom

altTitles.pt-br: A Bebê Mestre das Flores Desabrocha

description.en:
"Gloriosa... You ugly thing that can't even bloom a single petal, you'd make perfect food for the trees-."

I was one of thirty-seven children of the Elvador family of the Flower People, and I was sacrificed to the tree that was the foundation of my family. Then, with the help of my betrothed, Arvid, my family was destroyed and I was only saved by my death.

When I woke up, I was transported back in time...? Do I have to relive my horrible past all over again? I wasn’t even saved by dying?! ...If I have to start all over again, I'll save myself in this life-! This is Gloriosa's intense and endearing redemption.

Shen Lang traveled to the past and became a matrilocal son-in-law of a wealthy family. And yet he was kicked out for being a good-for-nothing. So he swore that he would marry a more powerful and striking noblewoman.

I'm not going to practice martial arts in my whole life! I'll groom my wife to be the No.1 martial master in the world! She will kick the ass of anyone who dares to mess with me!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32611)
description.pt-br: Sheng lang foi expulso de casa por ser um desperdício de comida e oxigênio, coisas aconteceram e ele acabou em outro mundo, para sobreviver nesse novo mundo ele precisa aprender artes marciais mas como ele é muito preguiçoso e fraco ele concluiu que sua melhor opção é encontrar uma esposa bonita, rica e talentosa e ser apenas um marido troféu que passa seus dias aproveitando as riquezas da vida!! E se alguém se atreve a perturbar sua paz, ele vai dizer a sua esposa para chutar seus traseiros!!!

description.en: A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation…! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream…!
description.it:
Un uomo, infelice del lavoro che deve fare per il resto della sua vita, rimane coinvolto in un evento inaspettato…!  
Si è trasformato in un kaiju, una creatura mostruosa, che gli darà un'altra opportunità per raggiungere ciò che ha sempre sognato!
description.ru: Некоторые люди проживают серую жизнь, так и не пережив ничего захватывающего. Но нашему герою вроде бы повезло: хоть он и был недоволен работой, которой ему пришлось заниматься, случается кое-что неожиданное. Он превращается в кайдзю — чудовищное существо, и теперь получает шанс не просто изменить свою жизнь, а достичь всего, о чём он когда-либо мечтал!
description.tr: Yapmak zorunda olduğu işinde pek de memnun olmayan bir adam beklenmedik olaylara karışır..! Bir Kaiju'ya, dehşet verici korkunç, muazzam bir yaratığa dönüşür. Peki ya bu, uzun zamandır hayal ettiği şeylere sonunda kavuşabileceği fırsatıysa..?.
description.pt-br: Um homem, descontente com o trabalho que teve na vida, está envolvido em um evento inesperado...! Ele se torna um Kaijuu, uma criatura monstruosa, dando-lhe uma nova chance de alcançar o que ele sempre sonhou!

description.en: The world is not perfect. Learning to deal with its flaws is just a normal part of life. But there comes a point where these imperfections spawn a crushing realization… that something needs to change…
description.es: El mundo no es perfecto. Aprender a lidiar con sus defectos es una parte normal de la vida. Pero llega un momento en que esas imperfecciones nos hacen darnos cuenta de que algo tiene que cambiar...
description.pl: Świat nie jest doskonały. Nauka radzenia sobie z jego wadami jest tylko normalną częścią życia. Ale pojawia się punkt, w którym te niedoskonałości burzą miażdżącą realizację… że coś musi się zmienić…
description.pt-br: O mundo não é perfeito. Aprender a lidar com suas falhas é apenas uma parte normal da vida. Mas chega um ponto em que essas imperfeições geram uma percepção esmagadora… de que algo precisa mudar.

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

In shock after failing his college entrance exams, Nishikori Kon took his pet cat M'lady and fled. He ended up going from Kyoto to Mount Hakodate in Hokkaido. At his wits end, he was picked up by a young man named Tachikawa Ayakane, who hired him on the spot to work at his and his brothers 'café (though his older brother hates the word 'café') "Coffee & Cat". It turns out Ayakane was so impressed with Kon's pet cat's appearance that he wanted him to get the 5 unkempt cats of the establishment in order. Now Kon serves all the cats, but he has a secret that the brothers don't know about. Kon can actually see cats as human beings and understand their speech! Kon and his pet cat's new lifestyle is just beginning!

Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
description.es-la:
Errante, imponente, en algún lugar del vasto vacío espacial, Rendezvous espera! La única estación espacial construida dentro de un ser vivo, que aloja a los mejores científicos, guerreros, exploradores e ingenieros de la galaxia.
Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

description.en: Middle school life isn’t all fun and games for an art club girl either! From club activities to studying, games to manga, hobbies, BL, and “mufufu” fantasies…or even…love?! “Uchida” is a member of the “art club.” She’s got a lot of strange obsessions and she’s not great at dealing with people. A short candid manga about the ups and downs of school life with the classmates surrounding her and the adolescent boy who sits next to her.

A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!  


---
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

altTitles.en: The Strings of Love Cannot Be Separated

altTitles.ja: 恋の弦は離れられない

description.en: Yuu practiced archery in his grandfather’s dojo until he met Hajime. Both join their school's archery club and aim for nationals, but in reality Yuu has no interest in tournaments despite possessing amazing talent and ability, in fact joining the club was due to Yuu's secret feelings for Hajime.

Edward, a young priest, meets a veteran who's under a vicious curse. Before very long he finds himself falling in love, and makes a vow to save and protect Cliff no matter what.  
  
This is the love story of a young priest who wants to save his hero, the veteran.
description.pl: Młody ksiądz Edward spotyka weterana, który jest pod wpływem okropnej klątwy. Ze wszelkich sił stara mu się pomóc, jednak prowadzi to głównie do pojawienia się w jego sercu skomplikowanych uczuć…

altTitles.ja: 虹夏ちゃんにキスする週間？

altTitles.zh: 大公和侯爵能成为朋友吗？

altTitles.zh-hk: 大公和侯爵能成爲朋友嗎？

description.de:
Obet Alphons hat sich mit dem Sohn des Großherzogs angelegt und wird in ein Katz- und Mausspiel verwickelt!

„Meine eigene Zukunft liegt in Trümmern, du Trottel!“

Obet nimmt als Junge verkleidet an einer kaiserlichen Veranstaltung teil, um ein Teleskop zu erhalten. Sie versucht, ihr Essen zu genießen, als sie einen unhöflichen Jungen trifft, der sie für einen Bettler hält. Obet hält sich nicht zurück und erteilt ihm eine Lektion, in dem Glauben, dass sie ihn nie wieder sehen wird. Wie es das Schicksal so will, trifft sie am nächsten Tag „den Trottel von gestern“ in ihrem Gesellschaftszimmer an! Der Junge findet heraus, dass Obet ein Mädchen ist. Sie versucht, um jeden Preis wegzulaufen. Doch der unnachgiebige Junge ist ihr dicht auf den Fersen und bedroht die Zukunft der Alphons. Was will er eigentlich? Wird Obet es schaffen, sich von diesem hartnäckigen und mächtigen Kerl zu distanzieren?

---

description.en:
Obet Alphons gets on the wrong side of the Grand Duke's son and gets tangled up in a game of cat and mouse!

"My own future is in ruins, you jerk!"

Obet attends an imperial event dressed as a boy for a telescope. She tries to enjoy her meal when she meets a rude boy who mistakes her for a beggar. Obet doesn't hold it in and teaches him a lesson, thinking she'll never see him again. As fate would have it, the next day, she finds "that jerk from yesterday" in her drawing room! The boy figures out that Obet is a girl. She wants to run away, whatever it takes. But the relentless boy is hot on her tail, threatening the future of the Alphons. Just what does he want? Will Obet be able to separate herself from this persistent and powerful punk?

---
Obet gets on the bad side of the Grand Duke's son and falls into a chaotic, youthful romance!

"My future is in ruins, you jerk…!"

Obet attends an imperial family event dressed as a boy, for a telescope. She tries to enjoy her meal when she meets a rude jerk who asks if she’s a beggar. Obet doesn’t hold it in and teaches him a lesson, thinking she’ll never see him again…

"But why is that boy sitting in our living room?!"

The boy finds out that Obet is a girl. She wants to run away. But he keeps chasing after her. What does he want? Will Obet be able to separate herself from this persistent leech?

---
Obet has no idea what she signed up for when she attends the prince's oath ceremony disguised as her sick twin brother. Before she can make a good impression on the prince, a snooty young lord pokes fun at her, and the two of them spend the day bickering with each other. As it turns out, the lord is none other than Hinn, the son of the grand duke. To make matters worse, he instantly recognizes Obet when he visits her estate! Once he threatens to reveal what she did and bring shame to her family, she has no choice but to be nice to him. It's easy enough to avoid him at first, but this becomes harder when they start attending the same academy. Will Obet be able to keep Hinn from exposing her secret, despite the fact that he seems to be on a mission to annoy her 24/7?

---

description.fr:
Obet Alphons se met un jour à dos le fils du Grand-Duc et se retrouve embarquée dans un jeu du chat et de la souris!

«C’est mon avenir qui est ruiné, imbécile!»

La famille d’Obet la pousse à assister à un événement impérial déguisée en garçon en échange d’un télescope. Alors qu’elle tente de profiter de son repas, elle rencontre un garçon impoli qui la prend pour une mendiante. Obet ne se retient pas de lui donner une bonne leçon, pensant qu'elle ne le reverra jamais. Mais le lendemain, le destin fait qu'elle retrouve «le crétin d'hier» dans son salon! Le garçon comprend qu'Obet est une fille, et elle cherche à s’enfuir à tout prix. Mais l’impitoyable garçon est à ses trousses et menace l'avenir de la famille Alphons. Que veut-il au juste? Obet parviendra-t-elle à se défaire de cet imbécile qui est aussi tenace que puissant?

description.id:
Obet Alphons terpaksa menggantikan kembarannya—Ordo Alphons yang sedang sakit—untuk menghadiri upacara sumpah kesetiaan. Berkat penampilan mereka yang identik, segalanya berjalan lancar sampai Obet bertemu dengan Hinn Rehoboam, putra tunggal Duke Agung Rehoboam yang mengancam akan membongkar rahasianya. Meski Obet sudah berusaha menghindari Hinn, tapi takdir malah mempertemukan keduanya di sekolah yang sama! Apakah rahasia Obet akan tetap aman dengan kemunculan Hinn?

description.ja:
大公家の子息ヒンとオベット嬢のドタバタ青春ロマンス
“あんたさえいなけりゃ未来は明るいっての！“
高熱を出した双子兄、オルドーの代わりに皇室の儀式に男装して参加することになったオベット嬢 
それもこれも欲しかった望遠鏡を買ってくれるという母の甘い誘惑に釣られて… 
おいしいものを思う存分食べようと思っていたら隣には「お前みたいな乞食が来る場所じゃない」と 
何かとつっかかってくる嫌な奴。 
今後こんな奴とは仲良くする必要ないしと得意のサッカーゲームでギャフンと言わせてスッキリ爽快！ 
そんな翌日… 
“どうしてあいつが私の家にいるの?!”　 
あの嫌な奴が大公家の息子だっていうの？それに女ということもご法度の代理参加もバレてしまっていたなんて… 
逃げても逃げてもハイエナのようにしつこく付きまとう彼を、果たして追い払う事が出来るのだろうか！？

---

description.ko:
대공가의 아들에게 찍혀버린 오벳의 좌충우돌 청춘 로맨스! 
‘당장 내 미래가 깜깜하다, 이 자식아…!’ 

망원경에 넘어가 남장을 하고 황실 행사에 참석하게 된 오벳. 
맛있는 거나 실컷 먹으려는데 거지가 굴러 들어 왔냐며 시비를 거는 재수없는 놈을 만난다. 
어차피 한번 보고 말 사이, 오벳은 시원하게 한 방 먹이는데… 
그런데 왜 그 놈이 우리 집 응접실에 앉아 있지?! 
자신이 여자인 것을 들킨 오벳, 어떻게든 도망치고 싶다. 
그러나 거머리처럼 계속 쫓아오는 재수없는 그 놈. 도대체 목적이 뭐야? 
오벳은 과연 이 거머리처럼 끈질긴 놈을 떼어 놓는데 성공 할 수 있을까?

---

被大公家儿子盯上的奥贝横冲直撞的青春罗曼史! “臭小子,现在我的未来才是一片黯淡啊…!” 被望远镜收买女扮男装去参加皇室活动的奥贝。 本想尽情享受美食,却遇到了一个说她是乞丐各种找茬挑事的家伙。

description.es-la:
Un apacible día, se le presenta su primera prueba. En lugar del otro gemelo Ordo, que estaba enfermo, debe asistir a la reunión con el un príncipe de su edad. "¡No quiero ir! ¿Por qué tengo que fingir que soy Ordo?" "Oye, Ovette. Te compraré el telescopio que dijiste que querías tener la última vez". "Mamá, me convertiré en Ordo más perfectamente que nadie". Ovette entró en el palacio imperial con todo preparado. Y allí, se involucra con una persona extraña que ni siquiera es el príncipe. De todos modos, no voy a volver a verle, así que le apliqué la medicina correctamente... "Eres el único hijo del Archiduque Rehovem, ¿cómo te has hecho amigo de alguien así?" ¿Perdón... ...? Por alguna razón, tengo la sensación de que voy a estar terriblemente enredado con Rehovem. "Te deseo lo mejor en el futuro, el futuro de Alphonse". No, ¡espera! ¿Dónde está la amistad entre el Archiduque y el Marqués?

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54162322), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8555785), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/1629003272)

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: Romelia Senki ~Maou wo Taoshita Ato mo Jinrui Yabasou Dakara Guntai Soshiki Shita~

altTitles.ja: ロメリア戦記 ～魔王を倒した後も人類やばそうだから軍隊組織した～

altTitles.en: Romélia War Chronicle ~The Count’s Daughter Rallies an Army in the Wake of Mankind’s Victory~

altTitles.th: บันทึกสงครามโรเมเลีย ~ถึงโค่นจอมมารได้ มนุษยชาติก็ยังตกอยู่ในอันตรายจึงสร้างกองทัพขึ้นมา~

description.en:
“Romé, no, Countess Romélia. I can no longer do this with you. I am breaking off our engagement. We will part as soon as I return to my country.”

Prince Henri announced this to me while I was still rejoicing the long-awaited defeat of Zergis, the Demon King.

But the prince did not know, I have the miraculous power of “Grace.”

title.en: Maken Tsukai no Moto Shounen Hei wa, Moto Teki Kanbu no Onee-san to Issho ni Ikitai

altTitles.ja-ro: Makendzukai no Moto Shounenhei wa, Moto Tekikanbu no Onee-san to Issho ni Ikitai
Maken Tsukai no Moto Shōnen Hei wa, Moto Teki Kanbu no Onēsan to Issho ni Ikitai

altTitles.ja: 魔剣使いの元少年兵は、元敵幹部のお姉さんと一緒に生きたい

altTitles.en: A Former Child Soldier Who Uses a Magic Sword Wants to Live With a Missy, the Former Enemy Leader

altTitles.id: Seorang Mantan Prajurit Laki-laki Pengguna Pedang Sakti, Ingin Tinggal Bersama Mbak-Mbak yang Mantan Pemimpin Musuh

altTitles.zh: 魔王女干部X勇者少年兵

altTitles.es-la: Un antiguo niño soldado con una espada mágica quiere vivir con su hermana, una antigua líder enemiga.

description.en:
Seto is an ex-boy soldier who was expelled from the party of heroes on his journey because of his ruthless and incomparable fighting style. The former leader of the Demon King's army, Satis, was kicked out after a series of failures.

The two "former" enemies decide to travel together to find a second life. Sometimes they go to hot springs, sometimes they sleep in the same bed, sometimes they are attacked by demons. But what do they find at the end of their journey when they lose their place in the world?

The road story of the (former) brave boy soldier and (former) demon lord's army leader's "rebirth"!
description.ja: 冷酷無比な戦いぶりを疎まれ、旅の途中で勇者パーティを追放された魔剣使いの元少年兵・セト。失敗続きで魔王軍を追い出された元幹部・サティス。“元”敵同士のふたりが第二の人生を探すため一緒に旅に出る。時には温泉に行ったり、一緒のベッドで寝たり――居場所を失くしたもの同士の“生き直し"ロードストーリー！
description.es-la: Seto es un ex-soldado que fue expulsado del grupo de héroes en su viaje debido a su despiadado e incomparable estilo de lucha. El antiguo líder del ejército del Rey Demonio, Satis, fue expulsado tras una serie de fracasos. Los dos "antiguos" enemigos emprenden juntos un viaje para encontrar una segunda vida. A veces van a las termas, a veces duermen en la misma cama... ¡Una historia de "renacimiento" para los que han perdido su lugar en el mundo!
description.pt-br:
"Seto é um ex-garoto soldado que foi expulso do grupo dos heróis em sua jornada por causa de seu estilo de luta impiedoso e incomparável. A ex-líder do exército do Rei Demônio, Satis, foi expulsa após uma série de fracassos.

Os dois "antes" inimigos decidem viajar juntos para encontrar uma segunda vida. Às vezes eles vão para fontes termais, às vezes dormem na mesma cama, às vezes são atacados por demônios. Mas o que eles encontram no final de sua viagem quando perdem seu lugar no mundo?

A história do "renascimento" do "antigo" herói e da antiga líder do exército do rei demônio!

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

description.en: Sabatora, a boy whose parents were killed by Kuragari, works as an Onmyoji for the Public Security Bureau to get revenge. His only comfort is Kyue, a Kuragari who lives with him. Kyue, who has lived with Sabatora since he was a small child, is a kind and gentle soul who is like an irreplaceable member of Sabatora's family. One day, however, Kyue is attacked by Seto, a colleague from the Public Security Bureau who hates Kuragari. In a pinch, Sabatora and Kyue undergo an unexpected transformation.(natalie.mu)
description.ja:
人間を食い殺し世を脅かす【暮明】。公安の陰陽寮に所属する陰陽師の鯖虎は、丑三つ時になると暮明を退治する生活を送っていた。

そんな鯖虎には1つの秘密が…。両親を失い唯一の家族【きゅえ(暮明)】を隠れ家で匿っているのだった。

だが上司の陰陽師に秘密がバレてしまったことで生活は一変!! 暮明に与する者は外敵と見なされ…!? 指名手配されてしまった鯖虎! 反逆のダークヒーロー譚ここに開幕!!

description.en:
I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

description.en:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！

title.en: The Boss at the Company I Joined as a New Graduate Is Not What I Expected

altTitles.ja: 新卒で入った会社の上司が思っていたのと違った
新卒で入った会社の上司が思っていたのと違う

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinsotsu de Haitta Kaisha no Joushi ga Omotteita no to Chigatta

altTitles.vi: Người sếp ở công ty tôi vào làm khi mới ra trường không như tôi mong đợi

description.en:
A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. 
Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through 
space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.
description.ru: С самого детства Заха Санко боролся за свою жизнь. Как гласят легенды, если вы завладеете костями Захи Санко, вам исполнится любое желание. Вместе со своим другом Авакяном и силой тьмы Заха путешествует по космосу, чтобы найти человека, который проклял его кости и положил конец их жизни.

description.en:
Suho, an all-round part-timer, was willing to do anything for money.  He was startled and ran away after accidentally witnessing his college sunbae Kanghyuk engaged in an S&M play at a motel during a routine pizza delivery.

Kanghyuk later visits the stunned Suho and makes an offer for a part-time role as his acting lover, which Suho finds impossible to refuse...
“Suho-ya, the boyfriend part-time job I asked of you also includes 'that kind of thing'.”

Yeonho is a military officer who uses his supernatural abilities to protect the people from various demon-like beasts. Although the abilities he possesses are extraordinary, his energy gets thrown into a frenzy upon exceedingly long usage, and he loses consciousness if he isn't purified right after subduing those ferocious beasts.
Yet, upon opening his eyes the next morning, he realizes that his frenzied energy had unbelievably disappeared after having sexual intercourse with someone while unconscious!
Having suspicions that the Purifier, Haejin, who has only ever been overtly concerned about his clan's authority and influence, couldn't have possibly purified him, Yeonho pretends to lose consciousness once again... Only to grab hold of Haeryung, the Purifier who enters his room for purification, and who is clearly a stranger but possesses an oddly familiar aura.
"Who... are you?"

Philosophers, burdened with unexpressed thoughts after lifetimes of reflection, have curiously reemerged in our world! Among them, Kierkegaard finds an unconventional outlet for his philosophy...music?! Watch as he rocks the city of Nakano with a comedic twist on philosophy!

title.en: Made in Abyss - Made from Fortunes (Doujinshi)

description.en:
The Abyss. A giant pit filled with gigantic cave system that goes down to extreme unknown depths, filled with wonderful and terrifying treasures and creatures never before seen. Only the bravest of the delvers are able to see what horrors truly lie in wait at the bottom. 
People are familiar with the great story of Made in Abyss, following a young orphaned cave raider, a mysterious amnesiac robot, and a tragic narehate. But, what if something went differently? What if one single decision changed these unfortunate childrens' story?

Up on Orth a pair of friends, Fyuo and Kwazan, a newly promoted red and blue whistle start experiencing a few strange things happening to them. Fyuo is having dreams of an unfamiliar figure and Kwazan decides to help him figure out the cause of these nightmares using notes she stole from another delver. But, what they find waiting for them only a few hundred meters down, will change their lives forever.

A Catholic school where everything seems tranquil and fine. But for Ayeon, a day doesn't pass without getting bullied until one day, Yeonhwa steps in against the bullies. Ayeon is grateful for Yeonhwa but what she doesn't realize is that there seems to be something more than just good intentions behind that beautiful smile.
description.pt: A história se passa em um colégio católico, onde a doce e gentil Song Ayeon, passa seus dias de tormento sofrendo Bullyng dia após dia, até que um "anjo" Baek Yeinhwa à salva com suas "boas" intenções, mas por trás dessa bondade toda ela têm seus motivos pra salvar a pobre donzela das garras…

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.

title.en: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Senior Who Annoys His Junior
A Story About a Senpai Who Annoys His Kouhai

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai ga Urusai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 先輩がうざい後輩の話

description.en:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

---

description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

description.en: A romance story set in the Meiji era. Born into a prestigious family and blessed with good looks, Satoko is said to have a short life expectancy. But suddenly, her life is targeted by a mysterious killer...?! In order to survive on the spot, Satoko makes a "proposal" for the killer...?! - A young lady and an assassin... A contract marriage love suspense between two people who should never meet!
description.es:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.ja:
令嬢と殺し屋…絶対交わらないはずの二人の、契約結婚ラブサスペンス！
時は明治。
名家に生まれ美貌に恵まれるも、余命わずかと言われている紗都子の唯一の夢は…家の利益になる結婚をすること。
しかし突然、謎の殺し屋に命を狙われ…！？
その場を生き延びるため、紗都子は殺し屋にある“提案”を…！？
description.uk: "Весілля світлячків" – манґа, події якої розгортаються у давні часи епохи Мейджі. Дівчина на ім'я Сатоко, донька заможної родини, якій пощастило успадкувати красу, прагне одружитися з тим, кого запропонує їй батько, але як же це зробити, якщо її життю загрожує хвороба? Одного дня героїня потрапляє до рук викрадачів, де, задля порятунку себе, вона пропонує шлюб власному вбивці. Куди її приведе узгоджений шлюб з людиною, яку вона ніколи не мала зустріти?
description.es-la:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de romance ambientada na era Meiji.  

Nascida em uma família de prestígio e abençoada com boa aparência, Satoko tem uma expectativa de vida curta. Mas de repente, sua vida é alvo de um misterioso assassino...?! Para sobreviver no local, Satoko faz uma "proposta" para o assassino...?! 
- Uma jovem e um assassino... 

Um suspense de amor por contrato de casamento entre duas pessoas que nunca deveriam se encontrar!
description.zh-hk:
千金小姐與殺手…絕對沒有交集的兩個人間的契約結婚愛情喜劇！
時值明治時代。
出生名門又集美貌於一身，卻被告知餘命不久矣的紗都子唯一的夢想是…為了家族的利益而結婚。
但是，突然之間被謎樣的殺手給襲擊了…！？
為了從這種局面中活下來，紗都子向殺手提出了某項“提案”…！？

title.en: Fake Saint of the Year: You Wanted the Perfect Saint? Too Bad!

altTitles.ja-ro: Nise Seijo Kuso of the Year: Risou no Seijo? Zannen, Nise Seijo deshita!

altTitles.ru: Фальшивая святая, отброс года. ~Идеальная святая? Нет, всего лишь подделка!~

altTitles.ja: 偽聖女クソオブザイヤー～理想の聖女？　残念、偽聖女でした！～

description.en:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] is a game ill-suited of being known as a galge, as the main heroine would – regardless of the chosen route – meet her demise.

Fudou Niito, a resident of Japan, went to bed dissatisfied with the ending of the game. When he next awoke, he found himself in the body of the game’s hated fake saint, Elrise. Confused, but with an understanding that Elrise’s actions would spell disaster for many lives in the future, he took advantage of the situation and acted to change the course of history.

As a result, despite her rotten personality, Elrise was adored by those around her as a perfect saint. Furthermore, the game itself was intrinsically linked to his original world and changed accordingly to suit Elrise’s actions. Without any knowledge of what the hell was going on, the fake saint Elrise continued to alter her fate.

A saint on the outside, but a man on the inside.

The transmigrator was a piece of shit and the person he transmigrated into was also a piece of shit. A combination of shit and shit would cause an accident – to create the greatest fake saint shitshow of the year!
description.id:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] adalah sebuah permainan yang tidak cocok untuk di panggil sebagai galge, karena apapun rute yang di pilih heroine utama akan selalu menemui ajalnya.

Fudou Niito, seorang penduduk di jepang, pergi tidur dengan ketidakpuasan pada akhir dari gamenya. Selanjutnya ketika dia terbangun, ia menemukan dirinya berada dalam tubuh seorang saint yang di benci dalam game, Elrise.

Dia kebingungan, namun dengan pemahaman bahwa tindakan Elrise akan menyebabkan bencana untuk banyak kehidupan di masa depan, dia memanfaatkan situasi itu dan bertindak untuk mengubah jalannya sejarah.

Sebagai hasilnya, terlepas dari kepribadian busuknya, Elrise di cintai oleh orang-orang di sekitarnya sebagai seorang saint yang sempurna. Terlebih lagi, game itu sendiri pada intinya terhubung dengan dunia asli tempatnya berada dan berubah berdasarkan tindakan Elrise. Tanpa mengetahui apa yang sedang terjadi, seorang saint palsu Elrise terus-menerus mengubah takdirnya.

Seorang saint di luar, namun pria di dalamnya.

Orang yang merasuki adalah seorang bajingan dan orang yang di rasukinya juga merupakan seorang bajingan. Kombinasi dari para bajingan akan menyebabkan mala petaka yang akan menciptakan pertunjukan saint palsu bajingan terbesar tahun ini!
description.ja:
異世界で無双！　偽聖女で何が悪い…!?
ギャルゲー『永遠の散花』は、どのルートを選んでもメインヒロインが死ぬギャルゲーである。 ゲーム内に登場する悪役へ転生した俺は、ヒロインのエテルナを救うため、ゲーム知識をフル活用しようとするのだが…？
description.ru:
Визуальный роман «Куон но Санка ~Fiore caduto eterna~» — несправедливая игра, где в каждой из веток истории главная героиня умирает. Я, переродившийся в поддельную святую-злодейку игры Эльризе, решил по полной использовать все свои знания об игре, чтобы спасти главную героиню, Этерну, однако…

Внешность святой девы, а внутри мужик. Дерьмовой душе — дерьмовый персонаж. Как же развернётся история, где по случайности два отброса слились воедино?

altTitles.ja: 大蜘蛛ちゃんフラッシュ・バック
ラッキー・スパイダー

description.en: First-year high school student Minoru Suzuki, who resembles his late father like two drops of water, often sees visions of his mother's past as a high school student through the eyes of his father.
description.pt-br: O estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio, Minoru Suzuki, que se parece com seu falecido pai, muitas vezes tem visões do passado de sua mãe como estudante do ensino médio através dos olhos de seu pai.

description.en: When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.

title.en: Hina no Mama ja Dame desu ka?

altTitles.ja-ro: Hina no Mama ja Dame desu ka?

altTitles.ja: ヒナのままじゃだめですか？

altTitles.ru: Почему мы не можем остаться детьми?

altTitles.es-la: ¿Por qué no podemos quedarnos como niños?

altTitles.en: Why Can’t We Stay as Children?

description.en: Hina from 5th grade has a secret she can't tell anyone: 3 months ago she started having periods. However, one day her childhood friend Daichi found out about it. These are the endless worries of children starting puberty.
description.es-la: Hina, de 5to grado, tiene un secreto que no puede contar a nadie: hace 3 meses empezó a tener su periodo. Sin embargo, un día su amigo de la infancia, Daichi se enteró. Estas son las interminables preocupaciones de los niñas que empiezan la pubertad.

title.en: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu

altTitles.ja: 陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど美人お嬢様に推されてます

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um otaku tímido e pobre, mas essa jovem linda e rica está obcecada por mim

altTitles.ru: Я застенчивый и бедный отаку, но эта красивая богатая юная леди одержима мной.

altTitles.en: I'm a Shy and Poor Otaku, but This Beautiful Rich Young Lady Is Obsessed With Me

description.en: Eiji is a high school student who lives with his father, an unsuccessful novelist. He is a shy, otaku, and poor boy, but he is an honest boy who never forgets the compassion for others that his late mother taught him. Even he yearns for Aoi, the daughter of the president of a large company. However, Eiji is unable to look Aoi in the eye because of the huge disparity between her and himself. One day after school, Aoi greets Eiji when he comes home. Aoi says one surprising thing to the surprised Eiji...
description.ja:
YouTube動画で550万再生！　運命に導かれたベタ甘ラブコメ！
エイジは陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど他人に対する思いやりの気持ちを忘れない素直な少年。そんなエイジも憧れる社長令嬢アオイさんがある日、エイジの自宅を訪れ、突如としてエイジとの婚約を告げるが…。

Yūchūbu dōga de 550 man saisei! Unmei ni michibika reta beta ama rabu kome! Eiji wa in kya de wotaku de binbōdakedo tanin ni taisuru omoiyari no kimochi o wasurenai sunaona shōnen. Son'na eiji mo akogareru shachō reijō aoi-san ga aru hi, eiji no jitaku o otozure, totsujotoshite eiji to no kon'yaku o tsugeruga….
description.ru: Эйдзи — старшеклассник, живущий со своим отцом, неудачливым писателем. Он застенчивый, отаку, бедный, но честный мальчик, который никогда не забывает о сострадании к другим, как его научила покойная мать. Он тоскует по Аой, дочери президента крупной компании. Однако, Эйдзи не может смотреть Аой в глаза из-за огромного несоответствия между ней и им самим. Однажды после школы Аой приветствует Эйдзи, когда тот приходит домой. Аой говорит удивленному Эйдзи одну удивительную вещь...
description.pt-br: Eiji é um estudante do ensino médio que vive com seu pai, um romancista malsucedido. Ele é um baita nerd, e mesmo sendo pobre é um menino obediente que não esquece a compaixão alheia que sua falecida mãe lhe ensinou. Aoi, filha do presidente de uma grande empresa, admira essa idade. No entanto, Eiji não conseguia nem olhar para a enorme disparidade consigo mesmo. Depois da escola um dia, Aoi cumprimenta Eiji quando ela chega em casa. Eiji fica surpreso quando Aoi lhe diz uma palavra de surpresa...

description.en:
Ura baito, also known as a shady part-time job: a gray area job that pays very well. The price you pay is your life.  
Yume Kokuryo and Nagomi Shirahama are seeking a large sum of money for some reason. 
To that end, they casually dive into various shady part-time jobs. 

This work may affect you physically and mentally. Read it at your own risk. 
We are not responsible for any damage to your health.

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

altTitles.vi: Belle cô lính đánh thuê hệ cồn

altTitles.th: ทหารรับจ้างสาวขี้เมา เบล

description.en:
A young traveller, when looking to take on a mercenary as protection against bandits, is forced to go with the cheapest: a young, cheerfully drunken warrior girl, who spends her income mostly on alcohol.
___
**Note**: Chapters “6.7” and “9.10” are Chapters 6 & 7 and 9 & 10 respectively. Chapters 6 and 9 are textless (and therefore have nothing to translate), so they've been put together with the successive chapter to comply with MangaDex rules.

The self-proclaimed Wilderness Jenny is a nature conservation officer in charge of terrestrial regeneration. One day, she picks up Flora, a girl with amnesia who was in a capsule that flew from the sky.

Together with Flora, Jenny goes on a journey to revive the earth while solving problems in cities filled with thugs and monsters.

Jenny, a conservation officer, and Flora, a mysterious girl, explore a western-style far-future world!
description.ja:
自称・荒野のジェニィは地上の再生を担当する自然保護官。ある日上空より飛来したカプセルに乗っていた記憶喪失の少女・フローラを拾う。
ジェニィはフローラと共にならず者やモンスターがひしめく街々の問題を解決しながら地上再生の旅をする。

自然保護官・ジェニィと不思議少女・フローラが西部劇風遠未来世界を大開拓！

altTitles.pt-br: Um hóspede não convidado do Paraíso

description.pt-br:
O mundo está dividido em três zonas. A Ilha do Céu, a terra e o submundo, ‘Proserpina’.
‘Miobe’, que mora em Proserpina, sonha com o dia em que poderá ir para Sky Island com seu primeiro amor, ‘Haluk’.
Porém, na noite em que Miobe estava dormindo, uma revolução que ocorreu no submundo mudou o destino de Haluk e Miobe…!

description.en: A true story about the creation of the camera.

On that day, humanity was turned into “prey”―Gen is a high school student living on the island of Tsushima, a door to mainland Japan.

Along with his sickly sister, Misaki, and his heartwarming mother, Gen was living a peaceful life, all until an “asymmetrical monster” appears on the island. All hell breaks loose on the island of Tsushima.

These monsters devour everything from plants to animals, to humans, and mutate together. Will humanity stand a chance against these mutant creatures? Is there any hope?
description.uk:
Того дня людство було перетворено на «здобич».
Ґен — старшокласник, який живе на острові Цушіма, що є дверима до материкової Японії.
Разом зі своєю хворобливою сестрою Місакі та чарівною матір'ю Ґен жив мирним життям, поки на острові не з'явився «асиметричний монстр».

Після цього на острові Цушіма починається пекло.

Ці монстри пожирають все, від рослин до тварин і людей. Після цього мутують.
Чи матиме людство шанс протистояти цим істотам-мутантам?
Є якась надія?

description.en:
The best way for the diverse human beings who make up society to unite is to find themselves a common enemy. School is a mini-version of society, so why shouldn't the same thing happen in a classroom setting?  
  
This particular class has chosen Xiao Shang to be that common enemy. But one of its more popular students soon finds himself becoming intrigued by Shang's unapologetic, straightforward way of life.  

This comic is posted for free on the author's weibo: <https://weibo.com/u/3567976483>
description.pl: Najłatwiejszym sposobem zjednoczenia się różnorodnych jednostek, które tworzą społeczeństwo, jest znalezienie wspólnego wroga. Szkoła jest mini społeczeństwem, więc czy to samo nie powinno odbywać się w klasie? Ta konkretna klasa wybrała na wspólnego wroga Xu Shanga. Ale wkrótce jeden z najpopularniejszych uczniów w szkole staje się zaintrygowany specyficznym życiem Shanga.
description.pt-br: Ao e Xun são amigos desde a infância que mantêm um relacionamento secreto fora da escola, na mesma escola existe o aluno transferido Xiao Shang que esconde uma vida totalmente diferente através de sua natureza tranquila. Círculos Sociais significam aceitações e esses meninos buscam uma forma de como se encaixar nesse meio.
